name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Wake County Public Libraries Amazon Browser

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will display book availability in Wake County Public Libraries on Amazon's book page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Did you find a book that you want to read on Amazon?

Would you like to find out if your public library has an available copy of that book before spending money on it?

Well, hereâ€™s a browser extension on Amazon's book page that tells you the book's availability without having to copy n' paste or type book titles to search for it in the Wake County Public Libraries' catalog! Yes, this app does it for you! [See the images below for how it works.]

Reading changes lives, so I hope you will enjoy the app and read more!

Version 1.2: Added a link to the "Not Found" message so that users can click and search and explore the library catalog themselves. 

Version 1.1: Updated the search query in the library catalog.
